scripts.mkdir-dirs: mkdir public/css && mkdir public/js && mkdir public/img && mkdir public/partials && mkdir public/css/fonts
scripts.copy-html: cp src/frontend/*.html public && cp src/frontend/partials/*.* public/partials
scripts.copy-css: cp src/frontend/css/bootstrap.css src/frontend/scss/bootstrap.scss && cp src/frontend/css/flexbox.css src/frontend/scss/flexbox.scss && cp src/frontend/css/fonts.css src/frontend/scss/fonts.scss && cp src/frontend/css/index.css src/frontend/scss/index.scss
scripts.build-css: npm run copy-css && node-sass src/frontend/index.scss public/css/bundle.css
scripts.build-js: npm run copy-jquery && browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] src/frontend/index.js > public/js/bundle.js
scripts.build-frontend: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-img && npm run copy-fonts && npm run build-css && npm run build-js
scripts.start: npm run build-frontend && npm run engine
